meta.description: Global leaderboard ranking - best ideas across all runs
meta.ranking_method: score desc, run_date desc, rank asc, idea_id asc, run_id asc

entries.target_user: Social media users and gamers who want quick access to meme sounds
entries.core_loop: Browse sound categories → Tap for instant playback → Favorite frequently used sounds → Share sounds to social apps
entries.evidence_summary: Soundboard users hate 'pop ups every 5 seconds' and 'TWO 15-30 second ads that you can't skip'. Want simple soundboards where 'not a single one of them would play anything' is fixed.
entries.reason_to_build_now: Strong market signal with clear user demand

entries.target_user: Office workers with back/neck pain who find existing posture apps too intrusive or inaccurate
entries.core_loop: Set up comfortable baseline posture, Receive gentle vibration when slouching detected, Track posture improvement over time...
entries.evidence_summary: Posture app reviews cite 'very sensitive default settings' causing 'false alerts for eating', users want solutions that are 'less annoying'...
entries.reason_to_build_now: Strong market signal with clear user demand

entries.target_user: People seeking simple daily positivity practices without complex journaling or meditation apps
entries.core_loop: Daily notification asks: What went well today?
entries.evidence_summary: Users want 'beginner-friendly' alternatives to complex apps that 'don't require programming or a lot...
entries.reason_to_build_now: Strong market signal with clear user demand

entries.target_user: Neurodivergent individuals and those with attention challenges who don't fit standard focus app approaches
entries.core_loop: Assess individual attention patterns → Try different focus techniques → Track effectiveness by cognitive type → Personalize attention training program
entries.evidence_summary: Users frustrated: 'Focus apps are one-size-fits-all' and 'need something that understands my ADHD/attention patterns'
entries.reason_to_build_now: Strong market signal with clear user demand

entries.target_user: Friends who need simple bill splitting without complex expense tracking
entries.core_loop: Enter total amount → select who pays → see individual amounts → send payment info
entries.evidence_summary: Social coordination apps need to reduce mental load with simple interfaces
entries.reason_to_build_now: Strong market signal with clear user demand

entries.target_user: Travelers who pack wrong clothes for destination weather
entries.core_loop: Enter destination and dates → see weather-based clothing suggestions → pack appropriately
entries.evidence_summary: Travel apps suffer from cluttered overwhelming feature sets
entries.reason_to_build_now: Strong market signal with clear user demand

entries.target_user: Screen workers who want break awareness but find existing apps too aggressive or shame-inducing
entries.core_loop: Set gentle reminder preferences → Receive subtle break suggestions → Choose to take break or dismiss → No tracking or guilt for skipping
entries.evidence_summary: Chrome Extension reviews wanting less aggressive break reminders and YouTube comments about notification fatigue
entries.reason_to_build_now: Strong market signal with clear user demand

entries.target_user: Users wanting simple water intake tracking without wellness app complexity
entries.core_loop: Tap to log water → see daily progress → get gentle reminders → track streak
entries.evidence_summary: Habit tracking apps praised for being simple enough for quick daily check-ins
entries.reason_to_build_now: Strong market signal with clear user demand

entries.target_user: Users who want to break autopilot app opening habits
entries.core_loop: Select distracting apps → app creates pause when opening → moment to reconsider → choose intentionally
entries.evidence_summary: Apps like One Sec popular for breaking autopilot scrolling habits
entries.reason_to_build_now: Strong market signal with clear user demand

entries.target_user: People interested in mood awareness who find dedicated mental health apps too clinical or complex
entries.core_loop: Tap daily mood color → See mood pattern calendar → Notice trends visually → Optional brief note about day
entries.evidence_summary: App Store reviews wanting simpler mood tracking and YouTube comments about mental health app complexity
entries.reason_to_build_now: Strong market signal with clear user demand

entries.target_user: Remote workers with non-standard desk setups who can't use traditional posture apps due to camera positioning
entries.core_loop: Calibrate app to your specific desk setup, Get posture feedback adapted to your camera angle, Receive gentle correction prompts...
entries.evidence_summary: Posture app complaints of 'camera doesn't face me directly', 'only see front view', need solutions for varied office setups...
entries.reason_to_build_now: Strong market signal with clear user demand
